Suppose $ A$, $ B$, and $ C$ are three numbers for which $ 1001C-2002A=4004$ and $ 1001B+3003A=5005$.The average of the three numbers $ A$, $ B$, and $ C$ is\\
\\
$ \text{(A)}\ 1 \qquad
\text{(B)}\ 3 \qquad
\text{(C)}\ 6 \qquad
\text{(D)}\ 9 \qquad
\text{(E)}\ \text{not uniquely determined}$
